Bonfire supports three separate spheres of migrations: Core, Application, and Module.

The Roles Module provides a simple, yet flexible Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) system for your applications.
Roles allow you to segregate which groups of users can access which parts of your site, or what actions they can perform once they are there.
